alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 15 at 2:08PM EST until November 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 6 inches possible in the most persistent lake effect snows, especially in northern portions of the county. * WHERE...Crawford county. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest concern for heavy snowfall in parts of Crawford County is late Wednesday night into Thursday morning. Snow rates may briefly reach 1 inch per hour in northern portions of Crawford County.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
